name: share_point
description: SharePoint is a Microsoft platform for document management and intranets, enabling teams to collaborate, store, and organize content securely and effectively

tools.name: SHARE_POINT_SHAREPOINT_CREATE_FOLDER
tools.description: Creates a new folder in SharePoint using the REST API.

folder_name.title: Folder Name
folder_name.description: The name of the folder to create.

relative_path.title: Relative Path
relative_path.description: Additional path within the document library (optional).

document_library.title: Document Library
document_library.description: The document library where the folder should be created.

tools.name: SHARE_POINT_SHAREPOINT_CREATE_LIST
tools.description: Creates a new list in SharePoint using the REST API.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the list to create.

template.title: Template
template.description: The template type for the list (e.g., 'genericList', 'documentLibrary', 'tasks', etc.).

tools.name: SHARE_POINT_SHAREPOINT_CREATE_LIST_ITEM
tools.description: Creates a new item in a SharePoint list.

list_name.title: List Name
list_name.description: The name or title of the list where the item will be created.

item_properties.title: Item Properties
item_properties.description: Dictionary of field names and values for the list item. Example: {'Title': 'New Item', 'Body': 'Content'}

tools.name: SHARE_POINT_SHAREPOINT_CREATE_USER
tools.description: Creates a new user in SharePoint.

email.title: Email
email.description: Email address of the user to create.

login_name.title: Login Name
login_name.description: Login name for the user (must match Azure AD UPN).

tools.name: SHARE_POINT_SHAREPOINT_FIND_USER
tools.description: Finds a user in both Microsoft Graph and SharePoint to verify their existence and status.

email.title: Email
email.description: Email address of the user to find.

tools.name: SHARE_POINT_SHAREPOINT_REMOVE_USER
tools.description: Removes a user from SharePoint. Will not fail if user doesn't exist.

email.title: Email
email.description: Email address of the user to remove.
